abstract: Lever House will close its garden courtyard and arcade to the public on Sunday, as it has once a year since 1953 to protect its property rights. Shubert Alley, Rockefeller Plaza and College Walk at Columbia University also close annually for part of a day.
snippet: Lever House will close its garden courtyard and arcade to the public on Sunday, as it has once a year since 1953 to protect its property rights. Shubert Alley, Rockefeller Plaza and College Walk at Columbia University also close annually for part of...
lead_paragraph: Any day is a fine day for visiting the garden courtyard of Lever House at 390 Park Avenue, that midcentury Modernist "Mad Men" masterpiece that was beautifully rejuvenated a decade ago. Any day, that is, but one.

headline.main: At Lever House, Public Is Always Welcome. Except This Sunday.
